items.name: Heavy Operator
items.desc:
Heavy Operator / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.6% ABV

items.name: THE BIG JUICE 12-Pack [+ FREE DELIVERY]
items.desc:
THE BIG JUICE 12 x 440ml Pack
This mixed case contains our biggest, juiciest DIPAs and NEIPAs, collected for your convenience in a 12 can pack. Beers included:
4 x SCENES FROM THE LAPSE – KVEIK DIPA (CITRA MOSAIC STRATA) – 8.0% ABV
Scenes From The Lapse is a new 8% Kveik DIPA using Citra, Mosaic and Strata! An almost unnecessarily sexy hop profile of passionfruit, mango and peach is finished with that turbocharger Kveik yeast to give it near-apocalyptic drinkability.
4 x VELVET SPOTLIGHT – DIPA (SABRO CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
Velvet Spotlight is a DIPA packing in spectacular Sabro, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe. Big, sticky mango and pineapple vibes take centre stage, softened with a little coconut and lime.
4 x HOUSE IPA – NEIPA (MOSAIC MOTUEKA AMARILLO) – 6.9% ABV
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.

items.name: THE PALE PALE PALE 12-Pack
items.desc:
THE PALE PALE PALE 12 x 440ml Pack
This Pale Pale Pale mixed case is Packed with Pure Pale Perfection. DDH for days. Beers included:
4 x HEAVY OPERATOR – DDH PALE ALE (SABRO CITRA AMARILLO) – 5.6% ABV
Heavy Operator is our new DDH Pale Ale using Sabro, Citra and Amarillo hops. That cheeky chappie Sabro is kept in check by the juicy fruit duo of Citra and Amarillo, so it’s just a *pinch* of coconut in this super smooth hazer with a peachy orange snap.
4 x LOW RIDE – PALE ALE (TOPAZ CITRA AMARILLO) – 5.4% ABV
This hot rod DDH Pale is modded out for super pale, low resistance, juiced-up refreshment. Citra, Topaz and Amarillo snap with apricot, bubblegum and resinous piney vibes. Pedal to the metal.
4 x BUCKLE DOWN – DDH PALE ALE (CITRA AMARILLO COLUMBUS) – 5.0% ABV
A DDH Pale Ale hopped with Citra, Amarillo and Columbus. Flexing fruity sherbet and superfresh dankness above its 5% ABV.

items.name: THE TOP TWELVE 12-Pack [+ FREE DELIVERY]
items.desc:
THE TOP TWELVE 12 x 440ml Pack
A highly limited, always-evolving selection, packed with all of our latest and greatest. Each case of 12 cans will consist of 12 different beers. Cases cannot be customised. Beers included:
SCENES FROM THE LAPSE – KVEIK DIPA (CITRA MOSAIC STRATA) – 8.0% ABV
Scenes From The Lapse is a new 8% Kveik DIPA using Citra, Mosaic and Strata! An almost unnecessarily sexy hop profile of passionfruit, mango and peach is finished with that turbocharger Kveik yeast to give it near-apocalyptic drinkability.
ACTION KING – DIPA (GALAXY CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
This absolute unit; this Cadillac of DIPAs; this liquid training montage is hopped with Galaxy, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe until it bursts out of its tank top.
FREEDOM VORTEX – WEST COAST IPA (CITRA CENTENNIAL COLUMBUS) – 7.2% ABV
Citra, Centennial and Columbus (name a more iconic trio we’ll wait) join forces for the Westie comeback tour. West Coast IPA just like mama used to make: blood orange, pine and grapefruit for days, with IBUs and whatnot.
HOUSE IPA – NEIPA (MOSAIC MOTUEKA AMARILLO) – 6.9% ABV
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the palate. Super drinkable and very moreish.
SOFT TOP – SABRO STOUT – 6.5% ABV
Soft Top is the luxury smooth ride you deserve. Built to Last™ with decadent, toasty malts. Hopped for Comfort™ with Sabro brand tropical coconut goodness. Smooth vibes and electric windows as standard.
HEAVY OPERATOR – DDH PALE ALE (SABRO CITRA AMARILLO) – 5.6% ABV
That cheeky chappie Sabro is kept in check by the juicy fruit duo of Citra and Amarillo, so it’s just a *pinch* of coconut in this super smooth hazer with flavours of mango, grapefruit and a peachy, orange snap.
BUCKLE DOWN – DDH PALE ALE (CITRA AMARILLO COLUMBUS) – 5.0% ABV
A DDH Pale Ale hopped with Citra, Amarillo and Columbus. Flexing fruity sherbet and superfresh dankness above its 5% ABV.
SWITCH BACK – PALE ALE (CITRA MANDARINA BAVARIA AZACCA) – 4.5% ABV
A light and juicy pale ale hopped with Citra, Mandarina Bavaria and Azacca. Packed with resinous and zesty fruit notes at an easy–drinking strength.
TROPICAL DELUXE – PALE ALE (CITRA SIMCOE MOSAIC) – 3.8% ABV
Tropical Deluxe is our core pale ale. Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe do the tropical dry hop tango, while the mighty London Ale III yeast strain keeps things soft, light, and as level as a hammock. Lower in alcohol, deluxer in tropical.
SCREWBALL – LEMON AND LIME BERLINER WEISSE – 3.5% ABV
This tangy, tart lip-smacker is our latest fruited sour beer. Light in strength and sharp with snappy citrus, it’s an easy-drinking summer sour.
PULL TOGETHER – TINY PALE (CASCADE CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 2.8% ABV
We’ve gone even lower in ABV than Superlight for this new beer, whilst packing in the tropical hop character, juicy yet crushable texture and clean flavours.
